verses.verse: Praise<WH1984> Yahweh!<WH3050> Give thanks<WH3034> to Yahweh,<WH3050> for he is good,<WH2896> for his loving kindness<WH2896> endures forever.<WH5769>
Who can utter<WH4448> the mighty acts<WH1369> of Yahweh,<WH3068> or fully declare<WH8085> all his praise?<WH8416>
Blessed<WH835> are those who keep<WH8104> justice.<WH4941> Blessed is one who does<WH6213> what is right<WH6666> at all times.<WH6256>
Remember<WH2142> me,<WH3068> Yahweh, with the favor<WH7522> that you show to your people.<WH5971> Visit<WH6485> me with your salvation,<WH3444>
that I may see<WH7200> the prosperity<WH2896> of your chosen,<WH972> that I may rejoice<WH8055> in the gladness<WH8057> of your nation,<WH1471> that I may glory<WH1984> with your inheritance.<WH5159>
We have sinned<WH2398> with our fathers.<WH1> We have committed iniquity.<WH5753> We have done wickedly.<WH7561>

Our fathers<WH1> didn't<WH7919> understand your wonders<WH6381> in Egypt.<WH4714> They didn't<WH2142> remember the multitude<WH7230> of your loving kindnesses,<WH2617> but were rebellious<WH4784> at the sea,<WH3220> even at the Red<WH5488> Sea.<WH3220>
Nevertheless he saved<WH3467> them for his name<WH8034>'s sake,<WH1369> that he might make his mighty power known.<WH3045>
He rebuked<WH1605> the Red<WH5488> Sea<WH3220> also,<WH2717> and it was dried up; so he led<WH3212> them through the depths,<WH8415> as through a desert.<WH4057>
He saved<WH3467> them from the hand<WH3027> of him who hated<WH8130> them,<WH1350> and redeemed them from the hand<WH3027> of the enemy.<WH341>
The waters<WH4325> covered<WH3680> their adversaries.<WH6862> There was not one<WH259> of them left.<WH3498>
Then they believed<WH539> his words.<WH1697> They sang<WH7891> his praise.<WH8416>
They soon<WH4116> forgot<WH7911> his works.<WH4639> They didn't<WH2442> wait for his counsel,<WH6098>
but gave<WH8378> in to craving<WH183> in the desert,<WH4057> and tested<WH5254> God<WH410> in the wasteland.<WH3452>
He gave<WH5414> them their request,<WH7596> but sent<WH7971> leanness<WH7332> into their soul.<WH5315>
They envied<WH7065> Moses<WH4872> also in the camp,<WH4264> and Aaron,<WH175> Yahweh<WH3068>'s saint.<WH6918>
The earth<WH776> opened<WH6605> and swallowed up<WH1104> Dathan,<WH1885> and covered<WH3680> the company<WH5712> of Abiram.<WH48>
A fire<WH784> was kindled<WH1197> in their company.<WH5712> The flame<WH3852> burned up<WH3857> the wicked.<WH7563>
They made<WH6213> a calf<WH5695> in Horeb,<WH2722> and worshiped<WH7812> a molten image.<WH4541>
Thus they exchanged<WH4171> their glory<WH3519> for an image<WH8403> of a bull<WH7794> that eats<WH398> grass.<WH6212>
They forgot<WH7911> God,<WH410> their Savior,<WH3467> who had done<WH6213> great things<WH1419> in Egypt,<WH4714>
Wondrous works<WH6381> in the land<WH776> of Ham,<WH2526> and awesome things<WH3372> by the Red<WH5488> Sea.<WH3220>

Therefore he said<WH559> that he would destroy<WH8045> them,<WH4872> had Moses, his chosen,<WH972> not<WH3884> stood<WH5975> before<WH6440> him in the breach,<WH6556> to turn away<WH7725> his wrath,<WH2534> so that he wouldn't<WH7843> destroy them.
Yes,<WH3988> they despised the pleasant<WH2532> land.<WH776> They didn't<WH539> believe his word,<WH1697>
but murmured<WH7279> in their tents,<WH168> and didn't<WH8085> listen to Yahweh<WH3068>'s voice.<WH6963>
Therefore he swore<WH5375> to<WH3027> them that he would overthrow<WH5307> them in the wilderness,<WH4057>
that he would overthrow<WH5307> their seed<WH2233> among the nations,<WH1471> and scatter<WH2219> them in the lands.<WH776>
They joined<WH6775> themselves also to Baal<WH1187> Peor,<WH398> and ate the sacrifices<WH2077> of the dead.<WH4191>
Thus they provoked him to anger<WH3707> with their deeds.<WH4611> The plague<WH4046> broke in on them.<WH6555>
Then Phinehas<WH6372> stood up,<WH5975> and executed judgment,<WH6419> so the plague<WH4046> was stopped.<WH6113>
That was credited<WH2803> to him for righteousness,<WH6666> for all<WH1755> generations<WH1755> to<WH5704> come.<WH5769>
They angered<WH7107> him also at the waters<WH4325> of Meribah,<WH4808> so that Moses<WH4872> was troubled for their sakes;<WH3415>
because they were rebellious<WH4784> against his spirit,<WH7307> he spoke rashly<WH981> with his lips.<WH8193>
They didn't<WH8045> destroy the peoples,<WH5971> as Yahweh<WH3068> commanded them,<WH559>
but mixed<WH6148> themselves with the nations,<WH1471> and learned<WH3925> their works.<WH4639>
They served<WH5647> their idols,<WH6091> which became a snare to them.<WH4170>
Yes,<WH2076> they sacrificed their sons<WH1121> and their daughters<WH1323> to demons.<WH7700>

They shed<WH8210> innocent<WH5355> blood,<WH1818> even the blood<WH1818> of their sons<WH1121> and of their daughters,<WH1323> whom they sacrificed<WH2076> to the idols<WH6091> of Canaan.<WH3667> The land<WH776> was polluted<WH2610> with blood.<WH1818>
Thus were they defiled<WH2930> with their works,<WH4639> and prostituted<WH2181> themselves in their deeds.<WH4639>
Therefore Yahweh<WH3068> burned<WH2734> with anger<WH639> against his people.<WH5971> He abhorred<WH8581> his inheritance.<WH5159>
He gave<WH5414> them into the hand<WH3027> of the nations.<WH1471> Those who hated<WH8130> them ruled over them.<WH4910>
Their enemies<WH341> also oppressed<WH3905> them.<WH3665> They were brought into subjection under their hand.<WH3027>
Many<WH7227> times<WH6471> he delivered<WH5337> them,<WH4784> but they were rebellious in their counsel,<WH6098> and were brought low<WH4355> in their iniquity.<WH5771>
Nevertheless he regarded<WH7200> their distress,<WH6862> when he heard<WH8085> their cry.<WH7440>
He remembered<WH2142> for them his covenant,<WH1285> and repented<WH5162> according to the multitude<WH7230> of his loving kindnesses.<WH2617>
He made<WH5414> them also to be pitied<WH7356> by<WH6440> all those who carried them captive.<WH7617>
Save<WH3467> us,<WH3068> Yahweh, our God,<WH430> gather<WH6908> us from among the nations,<WH1471> to give thanks<WH3034> to your holy<WH6944> name,<WH8034> to triumph<WH7623> in your praise!<WH8416>

Blessed<WH1288> BOOK be V Yahweh,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> from everlasting<WH5769> even to everlasting!<WH5769> Let all the people<WH5971> say,<WH559> "Amen.<WH543>" Praise<WH1984> Yah!<WH3050>
